;Diagonal Streets

;;
;Replace orthogonal end piece with diagonal version
;

;'Blends' tiles for diagonal to orthogonal at 45 degree angle
;
0x05000f00,3,0,0x5f500200,2,0=0x5f500D00,3,0,0x5f500400,3,1

;
;Enforce 45 degree rules
;
0x05000f00,3,0,0x5f500D00,3,0=0x5f500D00,3,0,0x5f500400,3,1

;
;'Blends' tiles for diagonal to orthogonal at 135 degree angle
;

0x05004b00,3,0,0x5f500200,1,0=0x5f500500,1,1,0x5f500400,1,0
0x5f500200,0,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5f500400,1,1,0x5f500500,1,0
0x5f500200,3,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5f500400,3,0,0x5f500500,3,1
;
;Enforce 135 degree rules
;
0x5f500500,3,0,0x5f500200,2,0=0x5f500500,3,0,0x5f500400,3,1
0x05004b00,3,0,0x5f500400,3,1=0x5f500500,3,0,0x5f500400,3,1
0x5f500500,1,1,0x5f500200,1,0=0x5f500500,1,1,0x5f500400,1,0
0x05004b00,3,0,0x5f500400,1,0=0x5f500500,1,1,0x5f500400,1,0
0x5f500400,1,1,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5f500400,1,1,0x5f500500,1,0
0x5f500200,0,0,0x5f500500,1,0=0x5f500400,1,1,0x5f500500,1,0
0x5f500400,3,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5f500400,3,0,0x5f500500,3,1
0x5f500200,3,0,0x5f500500,3,1=0x5f500400,3,0,0x5f500500,3,1
;
;'Blends' tiles for 'S' bend
;

0x5f500500,3,1,0x5f500200,1,0=0x5f501000,1,1,0x5f500400,1,0
;
;Enforce 'S' bend
;
0x5f500200,0,0,0x5f500400,1,1=0x5f500400,1,1,0x5f501000,1,0
0x5f500400,1,1,0x5f500500,3,0=0x5f500400,1,1,0x5f501000,1,0
0x5f500500,3,1,0x5f501000,1,1=0x5f501000,1,1,0x5f500400,1,0
0x5f501000,1,1,0x5f500200,1,0=0x5f501000,1,1,0x5f500400,1,0
;
;'Blends' tile for 'C' bend
;
0x5f500200,0,0,0x5f500500,1,1=0x5f500400,1,1,0x5f501100,3,0
0x5f500500,1,0,0x5f500200,1,0=0x5f501100,3,0,0x5f500400,1,0
;
;Enforce 'C' bend
;

0x5f500400,1,1,0x5f500500,1,1=0x5f500400,1,1,0x5f501100,3,0

;Diagonal Streets
;Added by memo 10/10/06
;;
;;
;old diagonal streets to new ones - transition
